item.title: 凯雷将加快首次公开募股（IPO）步伐，计划在 2025 年实现高达 50 亿美元的退出规模
item.description: 凯雷投资集团（Carlyle Group）的私募股权主管告诉路透社，该集团预计今年将有更多的投资组合公司上市，而且不会回避大型杠杆收购，押注今年美国交易的反弹。【原文：Carlyle Group expects to take more of its portfolio companies public this year and will not shy away from large leveraged buyouts, betting on a rebound in U.S. dealmaking this year, its heads of private equity told Reuters.】

item.title: 摩根士丹利以 "最佳选择 "支持人工智能和机器人技术，特斯拉上涨 2
item.description: 摩根士丹利（Morgan Stanley）重新将电动汽车制造商特斯拉列为美国汽车行业的首选，称即使在主力汽车业务陷入困境的情况下，该公司的人工智能和机器人技术仍能推动增长，特斯拉股价周一上涨了 2%。【原文：Tesla shares rose 2% on Monday after Morgan Stanley reinstated the electric-vehicle maker as its top U.S. auto pick, saying the company's artificial intelligence and robotics efforts could power growth even as the mainstay car business stumbles.】

item.title: 英特尔各部门成为焦点，台积电、博通周旋其中
item.description: 据报道，英特尔的竞争对手台湾中芯国际集成电路制造股份有限公司和博通公司（Broadcom）正在探讨可能拆分这家美国芯片巨头的潜在交易。【原文：Intel rivals Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Co and Broadcom are reportedly exploring potential deals that could split the storied American chip giant.】

item.title: 美国航空公司希望禁止直升机飞越华盛顿特区机场附近的部分航线
item.description: 今年 1 月，一架陆军直升机与美国航空公司的支线喷气式飞机在华盛顿里根国家机场附近相撞，造成 67 人死亡。【原文：A group representing U.S. airlines wants a series of safety changes after a fatal collision between an Army helicopter and American Airlines regional jet killed 67 people in January near Washington's Reagan National Airport.】

item.title: 加密货币交易所 Kraken 称美国证券交易委员会将驳回诉讼
item.description: 加密货币交易所 Kraken 周一表示，美国证券交易委员会原则上同意驳回指控其非法经营未注册证券交易所的民事诉讼。【原文：Cryptocurrency exchange Kraken said on Monday that the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission had agreed in principle to dismiss a civil lawsuit accusing it of illegally operating as an unregistered securities exchange.】

item.title: 美国 1 月份建筑支出意外下降
item.description: 受多户住宅建设支出下降的影响，1 月份美国建筑支出意外下降。【原文：U.S. construction spending unexpectedly fell in January, pulled down by a decline in outlays on multi-family homebuilding.】

item.title: 联邦通信委员会的卡尔表示，欧盟内容法与美国言论自由传统不符
item.description: 美国联邦通信委员会（FCC）主席周一表示，欧盟的内容节制法不符合美国的言论自由传统，有可能过度限制言论自由。【原文：The European Union's content moderation law is incompatible with America's free speech tradition and there is a risk that it will excessively restrict freedom of expression, the Federal Communications Commission (FCC) chairman said on Monday.】

item.title: 台积电首席执行官将与特朗普会面，推销投资计划
item.description: 台积电首席执行官魏幸全表示，该公司计划于周一与美国总统唐纳德-特朗普会面，讨论这家台湾半导体公司在美国的投资计划。【原文：TSMC CEO C. C. Wei plans to meet with President Donald Trump on Monday to discuss the Taiwanese semiconductor company's investment plans in the United States, the company said.】

item.title: 随着周二最后期限的临近，特朗普将决定美国对墨西哥和加拿大的关税水平
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）预计将于周一决定他将在周二早些时候对加拿大和墨西哥征收何种程度的关税，而此时正值就边境安全和努力阻止芬太尼类阿片流入进行最后一分钟谈判之际。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump is expected to decide on Monday what levels of tariffs he will impose early on Tuesday on Canada and Mexico amid last-minute negotiations over border security and efforts to halt the inflow of fentanyl opioids.】

item.title: 2 月份美国制造业保持稳定，但关税风暴正在酝酿之中
item.description: 2 月份，美国制造业保持稳定，但衡量工厂门口价格的一项指标跃升至近三年来的新高，而且材料交付所需的时间也在延长，这表明进口关税可能很快会阻碍生产。【原文：U.S. manufacturing was steady in February, but a measure of prices at the factory gate jumped to near a three-year high and it was taking longer for materials to be delivered, suggesting that tariffs on imports could soon hamper production.】

item.title: 消息人士称，意大利电信顶级投资者维旺迪对电网出售案的裁决提出上诉
item.description: 两位消息人士告诉路透社，意大利电信公司（TIM）的最大投资者维旺迪公司（Vivendi）已就一项法院判决提起上诉，该判决驳回了法国集团早些时候试图阻止出售该电话集团固定电话网络的企图。【原文：Telecom Italia's (TIM) top investor Vivendi has appealed against a court decision that threw out an earlier attempt by the French group to fight the sale of the phone group's landline network, two sources told Reuters.】

item.title: 关税不确定性打击市场情绪，加拿大工厂采购经理人指数下跌
item.description: 由于贸易前景不明朗，2 月份加拿大制造业活动出现了六个月来的首次萎缩，企业的悲观情绪达到了 COVID-19 大流行以来的最高点。【原文：Canadian manufacturing activity contracted for the first time in six months in February as an uncertain trade outlook led to firms turning the most pessimistic since the start of the COVID-19 pandemic.】

item.title: 福特 2 月份总销量下降 9
item.description: 福特汽车公司（Ford Motor Co）周一公布的 2 月份汽车销量下降了约 9%。【原文：Ford Motor Co on Monday reported an about 9% drop in its auto sales for February.】

item.title: 贝克休斯与 Frontier Infrastructure 建立碳捕集合作伙伴关系
item.description: 贝克休斯（Baker Hughes）周一宣布与前沿基础设施公司（Frontier Infrastructure）建立合作伙伴关系，以加速后者在美国开发大规模碳捕集与封存（CCS）和电力解决方案。【原文：Baker Hughes on Monday announced a partnership with Frontier Infrastructure to accelerate the development of the latter's large-scale carbon capture and storage (CCS) and power solutions in the United States.】

item.title: 亚马逊云计算业务未来几年将在印度投资 82 亿美元
item.description: 亚马逊的云服务提供商亚马逊网络服务公司（AWS）周一表示，未来几年将在印度马哈拉施特拉邦投资约 82 亿美元。【原文：Amazon's cloud services provider, Amazon Web Services (AWS), will invest about $8.2 billion in India's Maharashtra state over the next few years, an Indian ministry said on Monday.】

item.title: 欧洲通信卫星组织致力于加强欧洲卫星自主性，继续支持乌克兰
item.description: 法英卫星运营商欧洲通信卫星公司（Eutelsat）周一表示，在继续为饱受战争蹂躏的乌克兰提供互联网接入服务的同时，该公司将致力于提供服务以加强欧洲在天基连接方面的自主性。【原文：Franco-British satellite operator Eutelsat is committed to delivering services to strengthen Europe's autonomy in space-based connectivity as it continues to supply internet access to war-torn Ukraine, it said on Monday.】

item.title: 独家报道消息人士称哈萨克斯坦 2 月石油产量增至 212 万桶/日，创历史新高
item.description: 一位消息人士周一告诉路透社，哈萨克斯坦 2 月份的原油和天然气凝析油产量比 1 月份提高了 13%，达到创纪录的每天 212 万桶，再次超过了欧佩克+产油国集团的配额。【原文：Kazakhstan raised crude oil and gas condensate production in February by 13% from January to a record high 2.12 million barrels per day, a source told Reuters on Monday, again exceeding its quota within the OPEC+ group of oil producers.】

item.title: 交易员创纪录押注日元升值，期待进一步加息
item.description: 投机者们在为日本央行进一步加息做准备的同时，也下了有史以来最大的赌注--日元将继续升值，这与去年对日元的巨额押注相比发生了突然逆转。【原文：Speculators have mounted their biggest ever wager that the Japanese yen will continue to rise as they position for further Bank of Japan interest rate hikes, an abrupt reversal from huge bets against the currency last year.】

item.title: 中国吉利推出全新智能驾驶系统
item.description: 中国汽车制造商吉利周一宣布推出智能驾驶系统--全新 G-Pilot，该系统将在吉利汽车、Galaxy、Lynk & Co 和 Zeekr 品牌的汽车上使用。【原文：Chinese automaker Geely on Monday announced a smart driving system, the new G-Pilot, which will be available on cars under the Geely Auto, Galaxy, Lynk & Co and Zeekr brands.】

item.title: Tether 任命 Simon McWilliams 为新任首席财务官
item.description: 加密货币公司 Tether 周一表示，已任命 Simon McWilliams 为新任首席财务官。【原文：Crypto firm Tether has appointed Simon McWilliams its new chief financial officer, the company said on Monday.】

item.title: 特斯拉在斯堪的纳维亚半岛销量下滑，马斯克面临品牌考验
item.description: 由于首席执行官埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）政府中扮演的角色，这家电动汽车制造商面临着品牌忠诚度的考验。【原文：Tesla's Scandinavian sales fell sharply in February from a year ago, eroding its market share as the electric vehicle maker faces a test of brand loyalty amid CEO Elon Musk's role in U.S. President Donald Trump's administration.】

item.title: 摩根大通认为 2026 年铜价将达到 11,000 美元/吨，到 25 年第三季度末将征收 10%的关税
item.description: 摩根大通在周五的一份报告中称，该行预计到2026年全球精炼铜缺口将增至16万吨，并继续预测明年铜价平均约为每吨11000美元。【原文：JP Morgan expects the global deficit in refined to grow to 160,000 metric tons in 2026 and continues to forecast copper prices averaging around $11,000 per metric ton next year, the bank said in a note dated Friday.】

item.title: 早间竞标欧洲央行可能会绊倒在刺激政策上
item.description: Mike Dolan 展望未来一天的美国和全球市场。【原文：A look at the day ahead in U.S. and global markets from Mike Dolan.】

item.title: 索纳特拉奇公司和沙特阿美公司将 3 月份的液化石油气价格下调 1-3
item.description: 贸易商周一表示，由于油价下跌和全球液化石油气需求疲软，沙特阿美公司和阿尔及利亚索纳特拉奇公司已将三月份的液化石油气（LPG）官方销售价格（OSP）比上月下调了 0.9-3.2%。【原文：Saudi Aramco and Algeria's Sonatrach have cut March's official selling prices (OSPs) for liquefied petroleum gas (LPG) by 0.9-3.2% from the previous month because of lower oil prices and weak global LPG demand, traders said on Monday.】

item.title: 克罗格公司因个人行为被调查而解雇长期首席执行官
item.description: 克罗格公司（Kroger）周一表示，公司首席执行官罗德尼-麦克马伦（Rodney McMullen）已卸任，因为董事会调查发现他的个人行为不符合该公司的 "商业道德政策"。【原文：Kroger said on Monday Chief Executive Officer Rodney McMullen has stepped down from the role after a board investigation found that his personal conduct was inconsistent with the grocer's "policy on business ethics".】

item.title: 微芯科技将裁员 2000 人
item.description: 芯片制造商微芯科技（Microchip Technology）周一表示，随着业务重组，公司将裁员约 2000 人。【原文：Chipmaker Microchip Technology said on Monday it will cut its workforce by about 2,000 employees as it restructures its business.】

item.title: 经济数据和关税成为焦点，期货价格上扬
item.description: 周一，在对主要贸易伙伴征收关税的关键截止日期到来之前，美国股指期货小幅上扬，而本周将有大量数据公布，可能会对全球最大经济体的健康状况产生影响。【原文：U.S. stock index futures inched up on Monday, ahead of a crucial deadline on tariffs on top trade partners and a data-packed week that could throw light on the health of the world's largest economy.】

item.title: 特朗普的关税威胁打击加拿大油气钻探商
item.description: 由于美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）威胁征收关税，加拿大的油田钻探和服务业已经出现放缓迹象，这引发了人们的担忧，即如果继续征收关税，预期的行业反弹可能会停滞不前。【原文：Canada's oilfield drilling and services sector is already showing signs of slowing due to U.S. President Donald Trump's threatened tariffs, triggering fears that an expected industry rebound could stall if such levies go forward.】

item.title: 印度打击金融犯罪机构称 Paytm 违反外汇管理规定
item.description: 印度打击金融犯罪机构周一表示，其调查显示支付服务提供商 Paytm 及其部门违反了印度的《外汇管理法》，金额高达 61.1 亿卢比（约合 7000 万美元）。【原文：India's financial crime fighting agency said on Monday its investigation revealed that payment services provider Paytm and its units had violated the country's Foreign Exchange Management Act to the tune of 6.11 billion rupees ($70.00 million).】

item.title: 特朗普贸易威胁加剧全球海运不确定性
item.description: 随着美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）挑起与历史上的敌人以及邻国和盟国之间的贸易和地缘政治紧张局势，占世界贸易 80% 的全球远洋航运业正航行在一片未知的海洋中。【原文：The global ocean shipping industry that handles 80% of world trade is navigating a sea of unknowns as U.S. President Donald Trump stokes trade and geopolitical tensions with historical foes as well as neighbors and allies.】
